articles.title: Japanese gunman fires shots at hospital, seizes hostages in post office - The Washington Post
articles.description: Shots were fired at a hospital and two people wounded before the suspect fled on a motorcycle. The man has since been holed up in a post office for hours.

articles.title: For some cardiac patients with stents, long-term aspirin treatments might be on the way out - CNN
articles.description: For some high-risk cardiovascular patients with stents, the often-recommended practice of prolonged taking of aspirin might be ineffective, and in some cases, even harmful, a new study found.

articles.title: Britain's King Charles visits Kenya with colonialism's scars in focus - Reuters
